name: Solum
goal:
Solum is involved in the recycling of nutrients and production of renewable energy based on organic surplus.

Solum treats waste, builds biogas & composting plants and sells soil mixes and growing media based on compost.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Environment, Renewable energy, Waste, Soil, Recycling, Circular economy, Fertilizer, Agriculture
